channel.title: TIP: Get a summary and tag counts for your entire draft library
channel.description:
The [Draft Library Summary](https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/12X) example action does what it sounds like it might - scans your entire draft library, and summarizes it in a handy HTML preview.
The results include total drafts, number of flagged drafts, and a breakdown of all the tags you have assigned - for both the inbox and archive.
Considering re-organizing some of your tagging? Clean up any mistaken or mistyped tags? This is a great place to start.
[Install Drafts Library Summary](https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/12X) from the action directory.
![CleanShot 2020-05-22 at 07.54.38@2x|690x405, 75%](upload://iOJKkL0Kx8OsRPUZbaOlmGyRvqe.jpeg)
